setList.title: Manage snippets
setList.description: This is an overview of your snippet sets. Select a set and edit individual snippets to your liking. It will also be possible to import snippets, create new ones and export existing ones to local CSV files.
setList.cloneErrorMessage: Error while copying a snippet set.
